feature_evidence.json: Report mapping product features to related source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Plain-text collection of short descriptions for all frontend React components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining light/dark theme CSS variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with BrandProvider and CartProvider.
frontend/src/cart/CartProvider.tsx: React context managing cart items, persistence, and quantity/total calculations.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Mobile bottom navigation bar with active state and cart badge.
frontend/src/components/BrandProvider.ts: React context for storing brand name and logo with localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with editable brand name, logo upload, and navigation menu.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Renders a product card with image, price, optional quantity controls, and an add‑to‑cart button using cart context.
Displays a horizontally scrollable list of ProductCard components with left/right scroll buttons.
frontend/src/data/products.ts: Defines the Product interface and exports categorized product arrays for theplas and other items.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating related queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity auth context providing identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining CSS variables for light/dark themes and global styles including scrollbar hiding.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, wrapping it in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AccountPage.tsx: Renders an account page with user info and links to contact, FAQ, and placeholder sections.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Renders the shopping cart with item management, quantity controls, and an order summary, handling empty-cart and price formatting states.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesPage.tsx: Displays product categories with carousels for theplas and other products using predefined data sets.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides contact information and form fields for email and Instagram input within styled info sections.
frontend/src/pages/FaqPage.tsx: Shows an interactive FAQ list with expandable items controlled by local state.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home landing page featuring hero content, brand story, and sections highlighting mission and values.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Lists static notifications with icons and timestamps, falling back to an empty state message when none exist.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, typography, container settings, and animations with custom plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project state metadata and lists existing website features such as branding, story sections, product categories, and other product sliders with their requirement IDs and versions.
